name: EMPIRE UNDER FIRE - The Most Beautiful Strategy Game
name_original: EMPIRE UNDER FIRE - The Most Beautiful Strategy Game
description:
EVIL STRIKES BACK!!! PREPARE FOR HORDES OF ENEMIES!!!
EPIC AAA STRATEGY-DEFENCE!!

EXPERIENCE STUNNING VISUALS, FAST-PACED ACTION AND RICH GAMEPLAY!

+++ GET THE BEST OUT OF YOUR DEVICE +++
+ EVERY LEVEL IS A MASTERPIECE!!! +
+ STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS +
+ EPIC BOSS FIGHTS +
+ OVER 40 HIGHLY DETAILED VARIOUS CHARACTERS +
+ LOTS OF UPGRADES +
+ MOTION CAPTURE ANIMATIONS +
+ ADVANCED LIGHTNING AND POST-PROCESS EFFECTS +
+ BEAUTIFUL WATER +

Get ready to defend your empire against hordes of evil!
Put your strategic skills to ultimate test.
Command your troops to victory!!!

***Important**
This game requires iPhone 5/5C/5S/6, IPAD 3/4/AIR, IPOD 5th or newer device to run smoothly.
